translations: v.消除（eliminate 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: It's good for eliminating many possibilities.
sentences.translation: 它有利于排除许多可能性。

sentences.sentence: The government is committed to eliminating extreme poverty by the end of the year.
sentences.translation: 政府承诺将于年底消除极端贫困。

sentences.sentence: A wonderful world will come into being if all the countries succeed in eliminating poverty.
sentences.translation: 如果所有国家都成功消除贫困，世界将会很美好。
